title: Elderly woman left in agonizing pain after she was sodomized by male nurse
text:
Nurse Gene Paul Brown has been convicted of sodomizing an elderly woman he was tasked with caring for at the Bowling Green Health and Rehabilitation Center in Virginia

A 72 year-old woman was left in extreme pain after being sodomized by a nurse hired to care for her.

The woman, whose name has been withheld to protect her privacy, was wheeled in to court in her bed to recall how Gene Paul Brown, 58, had sexually abused her.

Brown was convicted of sodomy Tuesday after Judge Sarah Deneke told a a court in Fredericksburg, Virginia, said they believed the woman’s allegations.

He struck while his victim was bed-bound at the Bowling Green Health & Rehabilitation Center.

The woman initially considered Brown to be a friend – but says last September he forced himself on her, and had non-consensual sexual intercourse with her.

She says Brown performed other sex acts on her over a period of months, leaving her in pain and ‘ruining my life.’

The nurse’s reign of terror finally came to an end after his victim plucked up the courage to tell police about what was going on in March this year.

Fredericksburg.com reported that Brown had been due to stand trial by jury, before asking to have the judge decide his fate.

He had been facing additional charges of rape, abduction with the intent to defile and object sexual penetration, but these were dropped before Tuesday’s trial.

Brown will be sentenced on January 8, and faces up to life in prison.
